name: @iamsquare/footballapi
description: Copy football-data.org api data to local database

scripts.docker:rm: npm run docker:kill && docker rm footballapi
scripts.docker:create: npm run docker:up && docker exec footballapi mongo footballapi --eval "db.createCollection('footballapi');"
scripts.docker:drop: npm run docker:up && docker exec footballapi mongo footballapi --eval "db.dropDatabase();"
scripts.start: npm run docker:up && npm run scrape

author: squaremarco
